author: Omni-Bryx
title: He's like the Pikachu of this Lego theme
review:
Box/Instructions

The foil pack is like the same thing that the Mixels Series 1-3 has. They show the background of Mixel land, the color of that Mixel to represent the Tribe, and the back showing the Series 1 Tribe and the Electroids Max.

Parts

The parts is some what decent.

Minifigures

No signs of Minifigures.

The build

The build is quite simple and very quick once I opened the package.

The completed model

He looks something alike in the shorts but the tongue on the set is somewhat inaccurate.

Overall opinion

My overall opinion is he's a great way to build but there is a con: His tail can easily be popped off but still a great Lego set and I do adore his one eye.
